Hero.title: Discover <green>who you truly are</green> with the Personality test
Hero.description: With this test, you will find out your exact personality type.
Hero.termsConditions: By using this site, you agree with the terms & conditions

Features.feature1Title: Find out your personality type within minutes!
Features.feature1Description: Our test offers in-depth and personalized insights, enabling you to strategize your life and career more effectively.
Features.feature2Description: 92% of participants have successfully implemented changes to better their personal and work environments following our recommendations.

steps.step1Description: Ensure you're in a relaxed setting conducive to concentration for the test.
steps.step2Description: Respond to 100 questions designed to reveal aspects of your personality.
steps.step3Description: Access your report to explore the various personality types and find out where you belong!

stats.title: Uncover your exact personality type by completing our test.

WhatYouWillReceive.title: What you will receive
WhatYouWillReceive.courseLibraryDescription: Based on your test results, you can enroll in specific courses aimed at enhancing your skills.
WhatYouWillReceive.certificatesDescription: Upon completing the courses and passing the tests, you will receive a downloadable certificate.
WhatYouWillReceive.personalityReportDescription: A highly detailed and straightforward report that reveals your strengths and weaknesses.
WhatYouWillReceive.dailyChallengesDescription: Activities designed to help you improve your personality incrementally each day.
WhatYouWillReceive.testLibraryDescription: Access to over 20 assessment tests to help you evaluate your soft and hard skills.
